product_name: REI Grand Tour 80 Travel Pack - Women's
long_description: Designed for carrying comfort on extended treks, the women's REI Grand Tour 80 Tavel Pack is loaded with savvy touches such a removable, full-featured daypack. Suspension system can be adjusted to fit your torso length and its advanced backpack harness has nicely padded, ergonomically shaped hipbelt and shoulder straps. Detachable daypack has a roomy main compartment; organizer panel and a soft neoprene sleeve to hold your 13 in. laptop. Removable daypack rides in the outer stash pocket; daypack can also be clipped to the main pack's front sternum strap for greater security. With daypack removed, the pocket is handy for stowing a heavy coat; pocket also cinches snugly against the main pack to create a clean exterior. Main pack includes an integrated rain/travel cover to protect it from the elements and wear-and-tear during baggage handling. For added security, the main pack also has lockable outer zippers (locks not included). Interior compression straps prevent clothes from shifting; exterior compression straps stabilize the load. Side mesh pockets on main pack offer a convenient spot to stow a water bottle. Side and top handles with foam padding make the pack comfortable to heft. The women's REI Grand Tour 80 Travel Pack includes 2 internal aluminum stays to support heavy loads.
short_description: Designed for carrying comfort on extended treks, the women's REI Grand Tour 80 Tavel Pack is loaded with savvy touches such a removable, full-featured daypack.
